numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The headline is: Diversity seen in sports.
2. I noticed a higher percentage of players of color than head coaches of color.
3. Major League Soccer has the most head coaches of color.
4. The National Football League has the least head coaches of color.
5. The Women's National Basketball Association has the most players of color.
6. Major League Baseball has the least players of color.
7. I wonder why the number of players of color almost always outnumbers the number of coaches of color by a factor of 3.
8. I wonder why soccer has more coaches of color than every other sport.
9. The National Football League has a very high percentage of players of color.
10. The National Football League has the lowest percentage of coaches of color.
11. Major League Baseball has a low percentage of players of color.
12. Major League Baseball has a high percentage of coaches of color.
13. I wonder why these differences exist.
14. These statistics make me wonder if people of color get the same opportunities in the community for different roles in sports.
15. It seems that people of color get many opportunities to be players.
16. It seems that people of color get fewer opportunities to be managers or coaches.
17. We should give people of color more opportunities for management positions at a young age.
18. If people of color get more opportunities for management positions at a young age then more people of color will manage sports teams professionally in the future.
